ThingDef.label: tiger snail egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized tiger snail egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby tiger snail. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: quail egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized quail egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: quail egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized quail egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a quail chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
